Method Detail

createUi

public void createUi(in.appops.platform.core.entity.broadcast.ChatEntity entity)
This will create a chat display ui for the chat entity passed to it. This will also handle the toggling between chat and message and will also handle the closing of the chat display.

Parameters:
entity -

addChatMessage

public void addChatMessage(java.lang.String text,
                           in.appops.platform.core.entity.Entity chatInitialEnt)
This method will accept the text that has been typed and along with whom have typed the statement. The chat is wrapped in the entity and this entity is then set into a map which is then set into the global map contained in the chat entity.

Parameters:
text -
chatInitialEnt -
